## Matrix4.rotate() method

Rotates the current matrix by an angle in radians around an axis.

**Signature:**

```typescript
rotate(angle: number, axis: Vector3): Matrix4;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

</td><td>

The angle in radians to rotate the current matrix by.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

axis


</td><td>

[Vector3](./server.vector3.md)


</td><td>

The axis to rotate the current matrix around.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

[Matrix4](./server.matrix4.md)

The current matrix.
